visual_style: Documentary style, filmed with real people and authentic locations. Naturalistic appearance with realistic skin tones, clothing, and environments. Captured using handheld or shoulder-mounted cameras, giving a raw and unscripted feel. Lighting is natural and available (daylight, indoor lamps, streetlights), without dramatic staging. Sound and visuals emphasize realism over polish. Movements, gestures, and expressions are genuine and unscripted, as if observing real life. Visuals may include slight camera shake, zooms, or imperfections that reinforce authenticity. Style reference: National Geographic, BBC Earth, Netflix documentaries. Aspect ratio 16:9 full frame, no top or bottom borders, no black bars. NOT CGI, NOT animated, NOT cartoon, NOT stylized, NOT 3D, NOT render.
